about_the_game:
Betrayer: Curse of the Spine is a side-scrolling Action-Adventure game that places an emphasis on player decisions. Featuring intricate storytelling, a vast world to explore, valuable crafting, and multiple endings to experience. This highly atmospheric game is filled with drama, mystery, and dread. This Prologue version of the final game is intended to give players the early experience of Rise of the Betrayer, introducing them to the world, the mechanics, and the story of Aidan's adventure.

Wishlist the Full Game Now

Crafting at the Core


Part of overcoming the challenges in this world is learning to use all the tools you have at your disposal. One of the most valuable pieces of your toolkit is your ability to craft. Make potions to restore your health or to increase your strength. Make weapons to brutalize your enemies and armor to protect your tender bits.

Deadly Platforming and Skilled Combat


Not only will your wits be put to the test but your reflexes will as well. It's not all just stabby-stab. Run and jump your way to victory - and likely die trying, many times, before you succeed.

Reveal the World of the Betrayer


A land shrouded in darkness and mystery. Unlock the secrets of an ancient world and learn who you really are. Have we been here before? Multiple endings create high replayability.

Come Heckle Us

  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Betrayer: Curse of the Spine - Prologue is an Action-Adventure Metroidvania. This is just a taste of the full game which will feature decision making, crafting, fast-paced combat, multiple endings, intricate storytelling, an open world to explore, and more!
